articles.title: Lewis Hamilton to leave Mercedes and join Ferrari for 2025 Formula 1 season - Sky Sports
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton will leave Mercedes and join Ferrari for the 2025 Formula 1 season.
articles.content:
Lewis Hamilton will leave Mercedes and join Ferrari for the 2025 Formula 1 season.
Hamilton's current contract with Mercedes was due to expire at the end of 2025 but he will depart the team after th… [+8515 chars]
